    <script type="text/javascript">


      function randomString(e) {    
            e = e || 32;
            var t = "ABCDEFGHJKMNPQRSTWXYZabcdefhijkmnprstwxyz2345678",
            a = t.length,
            n = "";
            for (i = 0; i < e; i++) n += t.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * a));
            return n
      }

      function getOption(config, unit_id) {
          let ac = randomString(16)
          let name = `${config.object_prefix}${unit_id}${ac}.zip`
          const options = {
            // è·å–åˆ†ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ è¿›åº¦ã€æ–­ç‚¹å’Œè¿”å›å€¼ã€‚
            progress: (p, cpt, res) => {
              console.log(p);
            },
            name:name,
            // è®¾ç½®å¹¶å‘ä¸Šä¼ çš„åˆ†ç‰‡æ•°é‡ã€‚
            // parallel: 2,
            // è®¾ç½®åˆ†ç‰‡å¤§å°ã€‚é»˜è®¤å€¼ä¸º1 MBï¼Œæœ€å°å€¼ä¸º100 KBã€‚
            partSize: config.part_size,
            // headers,
            // è‡ªå®šä¹‰å…ƒæ•°æ®ï¼Œé€šè¿‡HeadObjectæ¥å£å¯ä»¥è·å–Objectçš„å…ƒæ•°æ®ã€‚
            // meta: { year: 2020, people: "test" },
            // mime: "text/plain",
            // å›è°ƒ
            callback: {
                // è®¾ç½®å›è°ƒè¯·æ±‚çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ°å€ã€‚
                url: config.cb_url,
                // è®¾ç½®å›è°ƒè¯·æ±‚æ¶ˆæ¯å¤´ä¸­Hostçš„å€¼ï¼Œå³æ‚¨çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨é…ç½®Hostçš„å€¼ã€‚
                host: config.cb_host,
                /* eslint no-template-curly-in-string: [0] */
                // è®¾ç½®å‘èµ·å›è°ƒæ—¶è¯·æ±‚bodyçš„å€¼ã€‚
                body: `bucket=${config.oss.bucket}&object=${name}&unit_id=${unit_id}&unzip_dir=${config.unzip_dir}`,
                // è®¾ç½®å‘èµ·å›è°ƒè¯·æ±‚çš„Content-Typeã€‚
                contentType: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
                // customValue: {
                //   // è®¾ç½®å‘èµ·å›è°ƒè¯·æ±‚çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰å‚æ•°ã€‚
                //   bucket: config.oss.bucket,
                //   object_name: name,
                //   unit_id: unit_id,
                //   unzip_path: config.unzip_dir
                // },
              }
          }
          return options
      }

      const config = {
        oss: {
            // yourRegionå¡«å†™Bucketæ‰€åœ¨åœ°åŸŸã€‚ä»¥åä¸œ1ï¼ˆæ­å·ï¼‰ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼ŒRegionå¡«å†™ä¸ºoss-cn-hangzhouã€‚
          region: "oss-cn-shenzhen",
          // ä»STSæœåŠ¡è·å–çš„ä¸´æ—¶è®¿é—®å¯†é’¥ï¼ˆAccessKey IDå’ŒAccessKey Secretï¼‰ã€‚
          accessKeyId: "STS.NTrZympmvYwZ9E9Y82HhDbE7p",
          accessKeySecret: "HVBJ828jUesudN8dHNLQciSZYsMyLMMfGD9EgYM66DQV",
          // ä»STSæœåŠ¡è·å–çš„å®‰å…¨ä»¤ç‰Œï¼ˆSecurityTokenï¼‰ã€‚
          stsToken: "CAIS6gF1q6Ft5B2yfSjIr5fHEcPZnbJX7rr3WAGzarOSVjeGpoVpFIXqaIuAoEml2Ihsz5Fdt604zkctz2OSVVov2r4VfomRJwlkt+Q==",
          // å¡«å†™Bucketåç§°ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚examplebucketã€‚
          bucket: "ruke",
        },
        object_prefix: 'batch_images_zip/IMG_',
        part_size: 1024*1024*500, // 500M,
        cb_url: 'https://b780-113-88-138-174.ap.ngrok.io/cb.php',
        cb_host: 'b780-113-88-138-174.ap.ngrok.io',
        unzip_dir: 'img_unit_goods'
      }
      const client = new OSS(config.oss);

      const unit_id = 128; //è·å–å½“å‰unit_id

      const headers = {
        // æŒ‡å®šè¯¥Objectè¢«ä¸‹è½½æ—¶çš„ç½‘é¡µç¼“å­˜è¡Œä¸ºã€‚
        "Cache-Control": "no-cache",
        // æŒ‡å®šè¯¥Objectè¢«ä¸‹è½½æ—¶çš„åç§°ã€‚
        // "Content-Disposition": `IMG_${unit_id}.zip`,
        // æŒ‡å®šè¯¥Objectè¢«ä¸‹è½½æ—¶çš„å†…å®¹ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼ã€‚
        "Content-Encoding": "utf-8",
        // æŒ‡å®šè¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œå•ä½ä¸ºæ¯«ç§’ã€‚
        // Expires: "1000",
        // æŒ‡å®šObjectçš„å­˜å‚¨ç±»å‹ã€‚
        "x-oss-storage-class": "Standard",

        // "x-oss-tagging": "Tag1=1&Tag2=2",
        // æŒ‡å®šåˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ†ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶æ˜¯å¦è¦†ç›–åŒåObjectã€‚æ­¤å¤„è®¾ç½®ä¸ºtrueï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç¦æ­¢è¦†ç›–åŒåObjectã€‚
        "x-oss-forbid-overwrite": "true",
      };

      // æŒ‡å®šä¸Šä¼ åˆ°examplebucketçš„Objectåç§°ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚exampleobject.txtã€‚
      

      // è·å–DOMã€‚
      const submit = document.getElementById("submit");
      // ç›‘å¬æŒ‰é’®ã€‚
      submit.addEventListener("click", async () => {
        try {
          // åˆ†ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ ã€‚
          const data = document.getElementById("file").files[0];
          let opt = getOption(config, 128)
          const res = await client.multipartUpload(opt.name, data, opt);
        } catch (err) {
          console.log(err);
        }
      });
